alert.note: Alert for Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued April 09 at 9:45PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Coastal flooding of between and 1 and 3 feet above ground level is possible. * WHERE...East facing shores in coastal Misissippi and coastal Southeast Louisiana will be most prone to coastal flooding. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
